place.name: SCARRINGTON
place.gazetteerText: Scarrington, par., township, and vil., Notts, 2 miles NE. of Bingham - par., 2850 ac., pop. 612; township, 910 ac., pop. 208. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
